title: Closure
creator_contributor_role: St Mary's Anglican Girls' College, school
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Adolescent psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal relations in adolescence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
abstract: A young girl loses her connection to those around her. 'Screen It' 2013 Winner - Best Overall Secondary School Entry.
description: A young girl reflects on her connections with her family and friends and she attempts to discover why she feels like she is being ignored. She focuses on the experiences from her past but continually feels an intrinsic connection to water. Only later does she discover why this is the case.
